revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Wireless Hard Disk Drive Box |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.asus.com/ru/support/Download/11/2/0/9/8/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_WL-HDD2.5 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = was |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = WL-HDD |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2.5 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/07/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_WL-HDD2.5 |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = mobile NAS, access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQWLHDD25 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4702;BCM4702KPB; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = BMIPS3300 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 125 <!-- 125 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320ATTC-90; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V283220T-7; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:2F, 00:11:D8 |oui = 00:11:2F, 00:11:D8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 1.1,IDE (2.5") |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDD, RTC, battery |addchip = IDE Controller;Promise;PDC20265R;;1; ,,, RTC chip;Ricoh;RV5C386A; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.220 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = WL-HDD |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = Oleg (wl500g), OpenWrt (Was)
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/30/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833320110 |asin = B000FHJ3JC |asin_country = JP |asin2 = B0007YB9KY |asin_country2 = DE |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4306; |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Yakumo Wireless Storage 60'' :[http://pc.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/2004/1209/pclabo28.htm Pictures and information] (JP)
Default SSIDs are per '''WiGLE''' data for the (presumed) default SSID. :Possible additional OUI of 00:13:D4..
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://wlhdd.co.uk/wiki/Main_Page '''Asus WL-HDD''' wiki] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wlhdd2.5 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?753-Asus-WL-HDD-inside-pics!! ''Asus WL-HDD inside'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?14297-WL-HDD-sdram-from-16-to-32MB ''WL-HDD SDRAM from 16MB to 32MB'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] :There is a ''[http://www.promise.com Promise]'' PDC20265R IDE controller on-board. :[http://www.ic-on-line.cn/view_online.php?id=1868902&file=0435\rv5c386a_5464726.pdf Ricoh RV5C386A] [http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?1642-Real-time-clock-with-Oleg-s-firmware/page3 RTC chip] used by WL-HDD.
